title: Has riot acknowledged the low voice on project yi?

replies.body:
Hey again! 

Just wanted to pop in and give you an update. We think we have a fix for this - we're in the process of verifying. ^-^

Hey Omega T33mo! 

We have acknowledged it. ^-^

 We're in the process of seeing what we can do to raise the volume. Since it's a legendary skin, there's a bit more to it than just moving a slider. We're hoping to have this completed soon, but it's certainly on our radar!
Yeah how come the grunting noises when he autos stuff is normal volume but his quotes are really low? Spaghetti code strikes again?
Not spaghetti code in this case - it's a matter of audio hookups.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=3AlBWjIZ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-19T23:13:10.929+0000)
>
> Not spaghetti code in this case - it's a matter of audio hookups.

Have you acknowledged the alpha strike bug? This has been driving me nuts for months

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LimM9a2ajE4

In this vid, if you play it at 0.25 speed you can pretty clearly see the ways he died there for most of them (some of them do look pretty weird tho), so as far as I can see, it's just a matter of unlucky timing rather than a bug.

> [{quoted}](name=Matsoman,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=3AlBWjIZ,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-20T17:54:30.416+0000)
>
> In this vid, if you play it at 0.25 speed you can pretty clearly see the ways he died there for most of them (some of them do look pretty weird tho), so as far as I can see, it's just a matter of unlucky timing rather than a bug.

22 seconds in is a clear cut case of dying mid alpha strike animation to rivens ult with no other explanations

Biggest thing you have to remember is in a lot of those he alphas one person, with no one else around. That means his Alpha isn't going to hit anyone else and he's going to come right back out of it, making dodging a lot harder. At least for a few of the deaths that looked like the problem to me. 

However, I play Yi and I can say I have similar experiences where I can't say it felt good/right. The big things to remember is that DOT still effects someone like YI in his Alpha, its a pain that hurts how the alpha feels but it helps how enemies feel against him. I think there could be a bug there, however with the way the ability works I think it would be really hard to prove or find. Most people also don't like Yi, they feel he's overpowered as is, so it'll be hard to find support for finding and fixing it. 

I'd love to see Riot's opinion on it though :) If Katey ever gets the chance to comment, I'm curious how they feel about it.
